text:
Hans-Michael Rehberg (2 April 1938 in Spree – 7 November 2017 in Berlin) was a German actor and stage director. He appeared in more than one hundred movies from 1945 until his death in 2017. He was best known for his role as Rudolf Höss in "Schindler's List" (1993).
Rehberg died at the age of 79.
